product.text:
The Rescuers in
Trouble in Devil's Bayou

Based in an adventure-filled swamp, this quirky story starts with the self-serving Mr. Snoops and Madame Medusa, who are both on the hunt for an elusive pirate’s treasure. The boorish duo will do whatever it takes to hit the jackpot, even if it means putting their helpless neighbors, Luke and Ellie May, in danger. The swamp friends enlist the help of Bianca and Bernard, also known as “The Rescuers,” who fly into the swamp and use their creativity to rid the swamp of Mr. Snoops and Madame Medusa once and for all.

Tie-in Activity: Ask your child to make a list of the people who help her throughout the course of the day, such as parents, teachers, other students, and even the crossing guard. Next, encourage her to think of times when she lent a hand to someone else.
